about_the_game:
Blind Bullet is a top-down 2D action shooting game.

The player is blind but possesses exceptional hearing, allowing them to perceive their surroundings through echolocation generated by footsteps.

Evasion

In the game, unknown enemies will attack the player.

When sound waves from footsteps hit the area where an enemy’s attack is coming from, the color of the waves changes.

Pay close attention to the changes in the echoes to avoid enemy attacks.

Attack

When sound waves from footsteps hit an enemy, the waves flicker, revealing the enemy’s location.

The player is skilled in handling firearms and can effortlessly use a shotgun when acquired.

Rely on the echoes to aim and take down enemies.

Investigate

The player is unaware of their current situation.

While they wish to find out what has happened to them and what is going on around them, their blindness limits what they can do alone.

Work together with companions they meet along the way to uncover the truth.
